channel.title: hugo on chiihou
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on chiihou

item.title: git commit -a -F init_commit.txt
item.description: This is the first blog post commemorating me finishing work on this template. I’ve been thinking about getting a domain and making a landing website for quite a while now, also using the domain for mail, file hosting, etc; but could never pay enough effort where it was due. Finally I was inspired by haiiro and reading about hugo made it seem like it’s gonna be a 2 hour task max.
